column1: * 1944 - While writing on The Lord of the Rings
column2: J.R.R. Tolkien sees a new character arrive on the scene. He later Letter 66: "(I am sure I did not invent him
column3: I did not even want him
column5: but there he came walking into the woods of Ithilien): Faramir
